original_title: Oriental Techniques in Pain and Pleasure
overview: A woman who has accidentally come into possession of an ancient Chinese manuscript is kidnapped by a gang trying to find the manuscript, and when she refuses to tell where it is, she is tortured, raped and forced to perform in a B&D/S&M sex show.
tagline: The brother and sister scene will have everyone clapping their hands except for Annie - who has hers somewhere else!!
title: Oriental Techniques in Pain and Pleasure
